name: Click Stuff - Prototype
description:
LEFT CLICK - Destroy item for points

ESCAPE - Pause game for restart and options

I've been learning how to develop games in Unity, and this project comes from Unit 5 in the Junior Programmer course on Unity Learn. I spent some time polishing odds and ends, and going a bit off course of what the material asked of me. Added the ability to pause, change music and SFX levels, Timer and lives, and a few other back-end changes.

Generally, I'm happy with my progress and wanted to put it somewhere.

I made the music and sound effects :)
